Our Professional Cloud Services

We cover the entire gamut of Cloud Professional Services

Existing cloud Infrastructure audit
Performance, compliance, and security are all optimised by our cloud infrastructure audit. We offer practical insights to improve data security and resource efficiency.
Data security assessment
In order to reduce risks and preserve your important data, our Data Security Assessment service assesses the effectiveness of current data security measures and detects weaknesses.
Capacity planning & sizing
For your IT cloud infrastructure, our Capacity Planning and Sizing service optimises resource allocation, scalability, and performance to ensure effectiveness and smooth operations.
Regulatory & compliance readiness
By ensuring that your IT infrastructure complies with industry norms and laws, our Regulatory & Compliance Readiness solution lowers risks and assures legal compliance.
Identify cloud platform & DevOps tools
To optimise infrastructure management and streamline development processes, use our Identify Cloud Platform and DevOps Tools service to help choose the best cloud platform and DevOps tools.
Business case preparation
By laying out the advantages and return on investment for cloud transformation, our business case preparation service assists organisations in creating a strong case for the move.
Migration readiness assessment
By assessing your current infrastructure and determining its preparation for a seamless and successful transfer to the cloud, our transfer preparation assessment service helps you reduce risks and disruptions.
Migration execution & optimization
Through continual optimisation and fine-tuning, our Migration Execution and Optimisation solution successfully migrates your systems to the cloud with minimal downtime and maximum performance
Workload classification & migration prioritization
To ensure a seamless and effective move to the cloud, our Workload Classification and Migration Prioritisation service analyses your workloads, classifies them, and determines the best order for migration.
End-to-end CI/CD pipeline automation
By automating the whole software development and delivery pipeline—from code integration to deployment—our End-to-End CI/CD Pipeline Automation service enables quicker, more effective, and error-free release cycles.
Containers orchestration
In order to provide seamless deployment, load balancing, and resource optimisation inside your cloud environment, our Container Orchestration service effectively manages and scales containerized applications.
On-prem vs cloud operating model mapping
In order to determine the optimum strategy for migration and optimisation, our On-Premises vs. Cloud Operating Model Mapping solution compares and maps your current on-premises infrastructure to a cloud-based operating model.

data.title: AWS Storage Solutions
data.content:
AWS Storage Solutions

Elevate with tailored, reliable storage solutions

  1. Home
  2. Expertise
  3. AWS Storage Solutions

We customize the following AWS storage solutions to align with your organization's objectives and budget.

AWS Storage: Your Data, Your Way, Anytime, Anywhere.

Whether you're running a Startup or managing a Global Enterprise, AWS Storage offers a comprehensive suite of solutions that cater to your unique data requirements, allowing you to craft your data strategy with precision

Our Offerings

Our offerings well suited to customers who need to archive their data, require frequent access to data, and seek durable and flexible storage solutions on AWS cloud. Healthcare-related sectors & Education sector has a significant need for archival solutions now days, OTT platforms often require Content Delivery Network (CDN) services, Technology and Software Development, Government and Public Sector & Financial Services has higher demand for backups and Disaster recovery solutions. Team InSphere is perfectly blended by highly professionals for this task that provide end to end mission critical & cutting-edge solutions for the clients

Our Services includes

Data Archive
Amazon S3 Glacier is an excellent choice for durable and cost-effective long-term data backup in AWS. It's designed for archiving data that is rarely accessed but needs to be retained for compliance, legal, or business reasons
Backup & Restore
AWS backup and restore solutions are designed to protect data from a variety of potential issues, including both physical and logical errors, to ensure data availability and recoverability. These solutions help safeguard your data from system failures, application errors, accidental deletions, and other data loss scenarios.
Disaster Recovery
AWS provides several solutions and services that enable organizations to implement disaster recovery (DR) and business continuity strategies, with a focus on meeting specific Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and Recovery Point Objective (RPO) requirements. RTO and RPO are critical metrics in disaster recovery planning, as they define how quickly you can recover data and systems and how much data loss is acceptable in case of a disruption
Primary Storage
AWS primary storage solutions, including Amazon EBS, EFS, and RDS, serve as the foundational storage layer for applications and databases. These scalable, reliable, and performance- optimized services offer a range of options to meet diverse business needs, ensuring data availability and durability
.
Consulting Services
Based on the best practices from several migrations we have done, our cloud Architects/Experts will bring together technology, tools & framework to help the enterprises for easy cloud adoption. Our cloud experts will walk through our comprehensive cloud adoption framework, which will help to build the infrastructure that helps you to provide better business results.

AWS Value Proposition

Cloud adoption none other than address previous challenges, but achieved several other benefits as well. By embracing cloud technology, our client significantly reduce their IT infrastructure costs by eliminating the need for physical servers and hardware maintenance. Additionally, it has enabled seamless scalability and flexibility, allowing businesses to easily adjust their resources based on demand and growth

Our team at InSphere provides digital transformation, product engineering, and product management services to ISVs, public sector organizations, and large enterprises globally. As a leading digital platform and product company, we work on cutting-edge technologies with Cloud and Data at the core of our thinking.

Our Journey So Far

As a company, we began our journey in 2005, and we have come a long way since then. A glimpse of our biggest milestones, our firsts, and our celebrations throughout the decades.

data.title: Our Blogs
data.content:
Multi-Network CMS

Discovering the country’s leading security forces provider web presence with customized web content & exceptional user experience.

  1. Client Success Stories
  2. Multi Network CMS
Services We Serve to
Security forces organization

Our cloud-based multi-architecture CMS comprises the ability to build & manage multi-domain, multi-branch & multi-architecture from a single codebased with speedily deployment solutions.

  • Objectives
    We aim at ensuring brand consistency with customize design templates across multi-domain websites with single codebase multi-site CMS. The central platform frameworks help to share the content across multiple sites ensuring data security on priority.

Highlights

The solution enabled the security forces provider organization to quickly launch specific sites from existing websites in an effortless manner. The quick launching has also led to digital presence expansion via the web within the nation.

Single hosting Web development

We build powerful custom websites and applications hosted by single server with a special focus on performance, design, and user experience.

AWS Cloud Infrastructure

Our cloud infrastructure is fully compliant with AWS and put together with a highly stable and secure network of partners

Single codebase Multi-domain CMS

web development with one codebase creates opportunities to host sites for multiple brands simultaneously with tailored content. Using the same codebase improves the code quality, organizes code structure, and consumes less time.

The Solutions

One Omni Platform
One CMS for all website, one annual fee, and one license to keep up to date
Better security compliance
Provide infrastructure security maintenance to ensure data protection and policy compliance.
Robust platform integration
Provides rapid content migration into the workflow with a reliable platform
Common Asset Repository
Manage all common assets like global content, branch content, blogs, articles, inquiry and all in a central database.
Multilingual content creation
Manage multi-language content across your website as your business scales up.
Content Publishing Controls
Establish a workflow for creating, and publishing different creative assets by assigning publishing controls to different roles within your organization.

Value Delivered

The multisite architecture increases the efficiency of CMS and provides an unbeatable advantage for business growth.

  • Time & money saver

    From launching new sites quickly by cutting down the costs on content hosting, multiple platform license fee, multisite CMS is a good time & money-saving option

  • Effective & consistent branding

    With multiple existing templates easily available in multisite CMS, the brand’s content is never compromised

  • Improved Management of Admin

    Managing content access permissions to a specific role for content publishing makes overall web content management less cumbersome

  • Are you looking for same success story for your brand?
    Submit
    Talk to Our expert

Impact

The country’s leading security forces provider has successfully managed to create and host multiple sites from a single codebase with customized content. Built-in features, templates, and widgets with proven plugins have also helped them to promote their content tailored to the audience's needs.

100+ Websites
on a single platform

Our Professional Cloud Services

We cover the entire gamut of Cloud Professional Services

Existing cloud Infrastructure audit
Performance, compliance, and security are all optimised by our cloud infrastructure audit. We offer practical insights to improve data security and resource efficiency.
Data security assessment
In order to reduce risks and preserve your important data, our Data Security Assessment service assesses the effectiveness of current data security measures and detects weaknesses.
Capacity planning & sizing
For your IT cloud infrastructure, our Capacity Planning and Sizing service optimises resource allocation, scalability, and performance to ensure effectiveness and smooth operations.
Regulatory & compliance readiness
By ensuring that your IT infrastructure complies with industry norms and laws, our Regulatory & Compliance Readiness solution lowers risks and assures legal compliance.
Identify cloud platform & DevOps tools
To optimise infrastructure management and streamline development processes, use our Identify Cloud Platform and DevOps Tools service to help choose the best cloud platform and DevOps tools.
Business case preparation
By laying out the advantages and return on investment for cloud transformation, our business case preparation service assists organisations in creating a strong case for the move.
Migration readiness assessment
By assessing your current infrastructure and determining its preparation for a seamless and successful transfer to the cloud, our transfer preparation assessment service helps you reduce risks and disruptions.
Migration execution & optimization
Through continual optimisation and fine-tuning, our Migration Execution and Optimisation solution successfully migrates your systems to the cloud with minimal downtime and maximum performance
Workload classification & migration prioritization
To ensure a seamless and effective move to the cloud, our Workload Classification and Migration Prioritisation service analyses your workloads, classifies them, and determines the best order for migration.
End-to-end CI/CD pipeline automation
By automating the whole software development and delivery pipeline—from code integration to deployment—our End-to-End CI/CD Pipeline Automation service enables quicker, more effective, and error-free release cycles.
Containers orchestration
In order to provide seamless deployment, load balancing, and resource optimisation inside your cloud environment, our Container Orchestration service effectively manages and scales containerized applications.
On-prem vs cloud operating model mapping
In order to determine the optimum strategy for migration and optimisation, our On-Premises vs. Cloud Operating Model Mapping solution compares and maps your current on-premises infrastructure to a cloud-based operating model.

data.title: Landing Zone for Jindal Steel
data.content:
Landing Zone for Jindal Steel & Power

As a solution provider we established a Landing Zone alongside the support in migration of workloads, One-time implementation & Managed services to JSP

  1. Home
  2. Landing Zone for Jindal Steel & Power
Implemented a Landing Zone
for Jindal Steel & Power Workload

Implemented a Landing Zone for Jindal Steel & Power WorkloadSuccessfully migrated multiple server workloads from on-premises to Google Cloud Platform, addressing challenges related to downtime and high costs. The new infrastructure is now more scalable, secure, and cost-efficient.

The challenge

The client hosted their workloads on-premises earlier and seeks to migrate (multiple Application & Databases) them to the GCP Cloud. Managing the scattered resources become challenging to the client. In the past they were facing scalability issues. They were experiencing downtime at the time of configuration, high hardware costs, underutilize resources, hardware failures, and data integrity risks.

The solution

The solution involves creating a structured landing zone on GCP to migrate the client multiple server applications and databases to the cloud. We organized the workload into Production, Non-Prod, and Network Hub environments, ensuring clear separation and secure management of workloads. Also, we have optimized all the machines on cloud after accessing the on-prime infra server’s utilization.

The result

The setup improves resource utilization, enhances security with centralized network management, and supports future scalability. By transitioning to GCP, the client addresses their previous challenges of frequent downtime, high costs, and data integrity risks, resulting in a more reliable and cost-efficient infrastructure.

Used Technology Stack

We have technical expertise in most of trusted Technology and framework

data.title: Migration for SAP
data.content:
Jindal Panther SAP Migration

As a solution provider Insphere role was providing Technical support in migration, One-time implementation & Managed services to Jindal Panther SAP-workload.

  1. Home
  2. Jindal Panther SAP Migration
Migration of SAP Workload
to Google Cloud Platform

We migrated the client’s SAP workloads to Google Cloud Platform, addressing performance issues and latency. The solution included high-availability (HA) for production, SAP-optimized instances resulting in enhanced performance, reduced latency and a 35% cost saving post-migration.

The challenge

The client hosted their SAP workloads on-premises earlier and seeks to transition them to the Google Cloud Platform. They decided to migrate to the cloud because they were facing performance issues & latency. Also their Dev/Prod environment were on the same server which leads to several issues like risk of downtime, difficulty in testing, compliance issues, data integrity risk.

The solution

We migrated the SAP workloads to GCP cloud which provides more scalability, durability, resilience & security to the workloads. We have separated the dev & prod environment. Lunched the prod environment in HA. In pursuit of performance optimization SAP-oriented instances are selected. Disks with high IOPS for HANA data and logs have been factored.

The result

Migrating SAP workloads to GCP has significantly enhanced performance, reducing latency, and ensuring scalability and durability. The separation of Dev and Prod environments minimizes downtime risks, improves compliance, and increases operational efficiency.

Used Technology Stack

We have technical expertise in most of trusted Technology and framework

data.title: JSP Attendence Portal
data.content:
Scalable Solution for JSP Attendance Portal

Support in migration of workloads, One-time implementation & Managed services to JSP. InSphere involvement ensured that the solution was effectively deployed, optimized for performance, and aligned with the client cost-saving objectives.

  1. Home
  2. JSP Attendance Portal
Scalable Solution
for JSP Attendance Portal

We successfully implemented GCP Cloud SQL to efficiently manage the client's database, reducing operational costs by 35% and ensuring seamless scalability during peak periods. The solution enhances performance, reliability, and data protection with a 99.95% SLA.

The challenge

The client needed a solution to efficiently manage their database on PASS service to reduce administrative cost and effort. They required a system that could minimize operational costs as well. Additionally, the client faced challenges during peak periods, particularly at the end of the month, where they needed a scalable solution to handle increased workloads without compromising performance.

The solution

From a solution perspective, we used GCP Cloud SQL to dynamically manage the client's database based on the specific needs. Implemented a policy that schedule stop and start of the server at night & day respectively. To handle increased demand, particularly at the end of the month, horizontal auto-scaling is employed to ensure sufficient resources are available.

The result

Solution resulted in a reduction in operational costs through efficient resource management and scaling, also provided seamless scalability by automatically adjusting resources during peak and off-peak periods, enhancing performance and reliability. Cloud SQL provided automatic failover and backups. In the event of hardware failures, data remains protected and available.

Used Technology Stack

data.title: Jindal Power Firewall
data.content:
Implemented Active-Passive Infrastructure with FortiGate Firewall

As a solution provider we supported JPL in One-time implementation & Managed services on GCP to implement the above solution

  1. Home
  2. Landing Zone for Jindal Steel & Power
Implemented Active-Passive
Infrastructure with FortiGate Firewall

We implemented a Fortigate firewall in an active-passive setup across different Availability Zones on GCP, providing enhanced security as Jindal Power Limited migrated workloads to the cloud. This solution ensures high availability. The deployment not only reduced operational costs but also strengthened network protection with centralized security and data replication.

The challenge

Previously Jindal Power Limited (JPL) were using Palo Alto firewall, which was about to expire. Jindal were migrating its workloads to the cloud and somewhere JPL decision influenced with the same. JPL has seen the scalability, advanced security features and resilience of the cloud environments. For their network protection they show the keen preference for Fortigate firewall instead of Palo Alto.

The solution

We created active-passive environment across different AZ and support the client to implement the centralized security of the GCP infra which is to be planned to migrate for their multiple application and databases. We used two different Fortigate firewall one in each environment that provide several layer of protection. We mirror the same with all the network configuration in passive environment

The result

Fortigate Firewall has added extra layer of security to their environment, and the deployment in GCP with Active-Passive environment has reduced the client ongoing operational cost as well as ensure full security with high availability in case of any failover happened to the active setup.

Used Technology Stack

We have technical expertise in most of trusted Technology and framework

Content buffering during ribution with latency and Static content storage was a challenge.

The solution

We migrated the CMS from on-premises infrastructure to a more reliable, flexible, and scalable cloud platform. Its resilient property has reduced the downtime. We used auto-scaling allowing horizontally scale-in and scale-out of the instances as per the requirement. Content ribution network was implemented to minimize latency and cloud storage was used for static and media storage.

The result

The implementation brought the significant benefits like reduced downtime, dynamic resource adjustment based on demand, eliminating the need for substantial hardware investments, improved system performance and uptime, minimized manual intervention resulting in enhanced operational efficiency and reduced costs for the client.

data.title: Jindal Steel Power
data.content:
Jindal Steel Power

JSP web, hosted on AWS Mumbai, now benefits from AWS cross-region replication. Key components like Amazon RDS and S3 media are duplicated in another region, ensuring seamless data synchronization and robust disaster recovery.

  1. Home
  2. Expertise
  3. Cloud Transformation
  4. Amazon Web Services
  5. Jindal Steel Power
Strengthening Disaster Recovery
with Cross-Region Replication
About The Customer

Jindal Steel and Power Limited (JSPL) is an Indian steel and energy company with its headquarters located in New Delhi, India. Founded by Mr. Naveen Jindal in 1979, JSPL has grown to become one of India's leading integrated steel manufacturers and energy producers. The company operates across various sectors, including steel, power generation, mining, and infrastructure.

Why JSPL Considered a Robust Disaster Recovery (DR) Strategy

In the context of Jindal Steel and Power Limited (JSPL), where significant workloads are already operational within the AWS cloud infrastructure, the recommendation from Insphere to establish a robust Disaster Recovery (DR) strategy carries vital importance. This recommendation stems from the recognition that the nature of JSPL's workloads is critical to the organization's operations and success. In line with industry best practices and AWS's guidelines, the implementation of a comprehensive DR strategy becomes paramount.

A Disaster Recovery strategy encompasses a series of proactive measures designed to safeguard against potential disruptions that could impact data availability, application functionality, and overall business continuity. Given the critical nature of JSPL's workloads, a DR strategy serves as a safety net against a range of scenarios, such as hardware failures, data corruption, natural disasters, and region-wide outages. Therefore, JSPL considered this as possible challenge and implemented a disaster recovery (DR) solution for their Amazon RDS database and media bucket, Static bucket & Load Balancer.

Total Transformation Management

Addressing these challenges with a well-designed DR solution helps JSPL ensure data availability, meet compliance requirements, and maintain business continuity, even in the case of unexpected disasters or disruptions.

Observation

Requirement Analysis on existing legacy Infrastructure in real time Environment

Design

Architectural design and diagram through qualified, experienced and certified AWS Solution Architect Professional

Implementations

Our AWS cloud infra manages digital method of student learning & their database management with a high level of security with Secure Partners

The Solutions

Transformation
Migrate and optimize for scalability, resilience, and cost-effectiveness, fostering enhanced agility and innovation.
Modernization
Update and optimize applications using AWS Lambda and container orchestration for scalable, efficient, and innovative cloud solutions.
Optimization
Refine resources, cut costs, and enhance performance with Auto Scaling, Reserved Instances, and monitoring.

JSPL's web application production server is operational in the Mumbai region within the AWS cloud infrastructure. In collaboration with Insphere, a strategic approach has been implemented using cross-region replication in North Virginia to enhance data redundancy and disaster recovery capabilities. This approach includes the creation of read replicas for both the Amazon RDS database, Load Balancer and the S3 media & Static bucket.

Amazon RDS Read Replica:
  • A read replica of the primary Amazon RDS database, which contains critical data for the web application, has been established in a secondary region
  • The read replica is a synchronized copy of the primary database, enabling real-time data replication between regions.
  • By having a read replica in a different region, JSPL ensures the availability of up-to-date data even if the primary region becomes inaccessible.
S3 media Bucket Replication:
  • The S3 media bucket, which houses essential media files for the web application, has been configured for cross-region replication.
  • Objects stored in the primary S3 bucket are automatically replicated to a corresponding bucket in the secondary region.
  • This replication process ensures that media files are redundantly stored in both regions, contributing to data durability and availability.
  • In the event of an issue in the primary region, JSPL can seamlessly retrieve media files from the replicated bucket in the secondary region.

By implementing read replicas for the Amazon RDS database and configuring cross-region replication for the S3 media bucket, Insphere has established a comprehensive disaster recovery mechanism for JSPL's web application. This solution guarantees data redundancy, minimizes the risk of data loss, and enables rapid recovery in the face of unexpected disruptions or outages in the primary Mumbai region. With this approach, JSPL is well-prepared to maintain uninterrupted service for its users and stakeholders, while upholding the highest standards of data availability and integrity.

Architecture Diagram

Outcome:

By implementing the Disaster Recovery (DR) strategy, JSPL has achieved notable improvements in several critical areas:

Data Redundancy:

  • Data is now stored across multi-regions, ensuring accessibility even in the event of a regional failure. This represents a 100% improvement in data storage architecture, greatly enhancing system reliability.

Data Availability:

  • Impact: Cross-region replication of Amazon RDS and S3 buckets has increased data availability by 4.99%, ensuring minimal downtime and continuous access to data and applications

RPO (Recovery Point Objective) & RTO (Recovery Time Objective):

  • The DR strategy has reduced RPO and RTO by 85%, allowing JSPL to recover quickly from disruptions, minimizing data loss and downtime, and ensuring operational continuity.

These improvements collectively ensure that JSPL is better equipped to handle unexpected disruptions, maintain continuous operations, and deliver high-quality service to its users and stakeholders. The comprehensive DR strategy has fortified JSPL’s infrastructure, enhancing its reputation and reliability in the industry.

data.title: National Open Schooling System
data.content:
National Open Schooling System

Discover how InSphere tackles backup storage challenges with a tiered approach using Amazon S3 and Glacier. Our solution automates transitions, optimizes cost, and ensures compliance for efficient backup management.

  1. Home
  2. Company
  3. Partner
  4. Amazon Web Services
  5. National Open Schooling System
Streamlining Backup Management
with Amazon S3, Glacier & VEEAM
About The Customer

The National Open Schooling System(NOSS) is an autonomous organization in India that operates under the Ministry of Education, Government of India. NOSS offers vocational education programs as part of its broader mission to provide flexible and inclusive education. NOSS's vocational education programs are designed to equip learners with practical skills and knowledge relevant to specific trades and industries.

Key features of Vocational NOSS Portal include:
  • Course Information
  • Admission and Registration
  • Study Materials
  • Assessment and Examination
  • Online Learning Resources
  • Student Support Services
  • Results and Certification
  • FAQs and Helpdesk
  • Feedback and Suggestions
  • Latest Announcements
Customer Challenge:

NOSS is the largest open school board in India which caters to the needs of a heterogeneous group of learners up to the pre-degree level. The board provides opportunities to interested learners by making Courses/Programmes of Study available through open and ance learning (ODL) mode. It was formed in 1989 and since then, more than 6 lakh students have been enrolled every year. In the last 5 years, it marks 4.13 million students' cumulative enrollment and due to regulatory compliance, the student data must remain in the database for 5 years. To maintain the humongous data there was a need for storage and student information retrieval was required at any point in time. It created a problem for the board to manage and maintain the data. The board has several modules deployed on AWS infrastructure; one is the Result correction module. Every day results are uploaded and daily backups are being made.

The daily backup size of DB is close to 89 GB which in the next five years becomes approximately 162 TB which will in turn generate large amount of data in the AWS S3 bucket.

But, due to the high storage cost of S3, we suggested they should use S3 Glacier which is comparatively has a low storage cost.

The cost was minimized but per compliance, data needs to be moved to archival after 10 days and auto- deletion after 60 months. It was becoming difficult to identify which data to be archived from S3 standard or S3 Glacier. And then we asked them to use a third-party solution, – Veeam.

Solutions:

Insphere recommended a storage strategy using Amazon S3 and Glacier for efficient handling of daily backups. The goal is to establish a clear and standardized solution that balances data accessibility, cost efficiency, and compliance with data management best practices. However, due to the non-monitoring facility available in S3 standard and Glacier, it was becoming a problematic situation for the client to identify the data that needs to be moved from Standard to Glacier and later on moved to archival state.

To resolve all the issues, we recommended using one of the ISV – “Veeam” which helped the client to identify which data from S3 standard is required to move to S3 Glacier and for archiving. The data backup was taken from the DB present in the EC2 machine.

It helped them to archive the data for a longer period, with faster recovery and recoverable anytime, anywhere.

The benefits of using Veeam are:
  • Data Monitoring and Identification
  • Data Archival
  • Cost optimization
  • Secure Backup
  • Faster recovery

To deploy Veeam in the whole value chain, we provided a step-by-step guide to the client and implemented a lifecycle policy on Veeam, ensuring the seamless transition of objects from S3 Standard to Glacier after 10 days which made it easier for archiving & automated deletion of versions after 60 months. We aim to streamline the data management processes, enhance cost-effectiveness for the client, and align the practices with industry standards and regulatory requirements

Architecture Diagram

Outcome:

The implementation of a database backup lifecycle policy strategy for NIOS has led to several significant improvements, particularly in terms of cost efficiency and data management:

We are saving 92% on RDS backup storage costs by utilizing a lifecycle policy to transition backups to Glacier after 10 days. These improvements reflect the successful implementation of a tiered storage strategy, resulting in optimized data management, cost efficiency, and adherence to best practices for NOSS’s database backup system.

Benefit:

The outcome encompasses improved cost efficiency, data accessibility, compliance, automation, enhanced data integrity, and scalability, establishing a reliable and optimized backup infrastructure.

Insphere Competency:

Successfully implemented Life Cycle policy to move all the data from S3 to Glacier

Identified an ISV – VeeAm which helped the client to resolve their data management issues by Archiving

Post-implementing the VeeaAm ISPL helped the client in accessing the data in quick time.

Saved their cost of maintaining the data in S3 standard for a longer time.

Private cloud environment or private cloud deployment refers to a tailored cloud architecture running on private, partner datacenters that cater to the needs and objectives of a single enterprise. Unlike public cloud solutions that allow seamless sharing of cloud resources and assets across multiple firms, private clouds are custom designed to address the concerned business’ core IT requirements. Online Recruitment Management System

In the era of digital transformation, automation creates regular touchpoints and nurtures candidates throughout the candidate’s recruitment journey.

  1. Client Success Stories

with more candidates

Our Online Recruitment Management System(ORMS) is a robust platform that automates and streamlines the recruitment process inter-state and cross-zone.

The automated ORMS helps to conduct the recruitment processes across different roles, and states & domestic markets with time & money-saving capabilities. It also helps to ensure greater transparency by reducing fraudulent practices during recruitment processes.
  • Objectives
    To automate recruitment process across various states & zonal markets in an easy, secure, customizable, and cost-effective manner - all at a centralized platform.

Highlights

A revolutionary cloud-based recruitment solution has helped to manage the recruitment process in a paperless, digital, and automated manner across different zones. This automated recruiting platform ensures complete control of the entire hiring process, centrally.

AWS Cloud Infrastructure

Secure Payment Process

Integrate highly secure third-party payment gateways to make your transactions secure and easier

The Solutions

One Time Registration (OTR)
Candidates can register themselves for multiple posts and apply for any job opening at any time. No need to fill out the application multiple times.
Online Admit cards
Manage & track admits cards of candidates who applied and send participation invitation in various selection rounds as per the requirements.
Online Results / Merit List
View shortlisted candidates after every round through online results. These results can also be kept saved for future reference during the interview or test process.
E-services (Edit, Update)
Edit or update any information related to candidates who have applied for a particular post through our user-friendly online interface.
In-app Notifications
Receive SMS notifications when it's time to take an exam or submit a form—and all of this is 100% free!
Third-party Integrations
Our system also has integrations with various payment gateways so that you don't have to worry about manual tracking of payments or reconciliation errors.

Value Delivered

By executing the recruitment process in the digital space with complete automation, hiring the right candidates with higher efficiency was never made easier.

  • Automate & hire

    Solve tedious recruitment tasks and conduct in-depth interviews & tests with an automated recruitment solution.

  • Improves recruitment productivity

    Access to candidates' databases on a single platform makes the process more efficient, less human errors, and increased productivity.

    Recruiters can digitally store candidate data and easily retrieve the relevant information.
